attributes.review: The idea of this app is wonderful-being able to show support for our president! When I saw that I could download an app to get updates and to learn more about trumpâ€™s regime, I was beyond delighted. However, when I opened the app, things began to go wrong. First, I entered my email, then I began getting emails asking me to rate trumpâ€™s appearance on a scale of 1-10. I finally responded and gave him a humble 5, because I felt the need to show our president some respect. However, that 5 apparently wasnâ€™t enough. The emails stopped coming, but then I began getting text messages all comprising of the one line â€œyou should be ashamed of yourself.â€ As the shame sunk in, all of my app logos turned into trumps face, looking horribly disappointed at me. The longer I looked at the little army of trumps, the angrier they appeared. I went to alarm my family not to get the app, but all they would say to me with hatred in their eyes was â€œyou should be ashamed of yourself.â€ I went into my bed and cried, only to realize my tears were now orange. A Cheeto materialized in front of me and told me â€œthatâ€™s what you get,â€ then floated away. I was now feeling alone and scared, but thankfully my cat came and cuddled with me. However, when I looked into her eyes, they were oranger than I remembered. Upon closer inspection, I realized that trumps face had spread from my phone apps to the eyes of my loved ones! I hurriedly rushed to a mirror and saw with increasing horror that in my eyes lurked the face of our very own president. But the longer I looked, I realized that it wasnâ€™t just my eyes. My entire body was changing rapidly to match that of Donald trumps! Thousands of Cheetos materialized around me, leering down on me as I began to panic, ominously chanting â€œthatâ€™s what you get. Thatâ€™s what you get. Thatâ€™s what you get.â€ I had a sudden vision of trump in the whitehouse, looking at my low rating of his appearance, tears falling from his eyes. Then, I felt myself being pulled away from my mortal body. I was now just an image of trumps face. With horror I realized that I was now one of the faces residing in some other unfortunate soulâ€™s phone! I knew I had to save them from this fate, so I hurriedly wrote this review with my brain. Please, whatever you do, donâ€™t download this app.
attributes.title: Donâ€™t do it
